# Overview

```{r}
library(rstan)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidybayes)
library(janitor)
```

# Read in data

```{r}
d_ca <- read_csv("../data/CA_mortality.csv")
unique(d_ca$county)
d_ca |> 
  mutate(rate = deaths/pop) |> 
  filter(county %in% c("Alameda County, CA", "Los Angeles County, CA",
                       "Stanislaus County, CA", "Del Norte County, CA")) |> 
  ggplot(aes(age, rate, color = county)) + 
  geom_point()+
  scale_y_log10()+
  facet_wrap(~gender)
```
